trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract base class for binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
This class defines the abstract base class for all binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe define a classe base abstrata para todos os elementos de associação usado para criar objetos de resolvedor de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: For specific implementations of this class, please see the documentation for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para implementações específicas dessa classe, consulte a documentação de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement" /> class.
Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement" /> class.
<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement" /> object to copy when creating this class instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement" /> class by duplicating the provided <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement" /> object.
Creates a peer resolver object with the settings defined on this binding element.
<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver" /> object that is used to perform peer name to address resolution.
The settings on the peer resolver must be defined on the binding element.
Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers created with binding elements created by implementations of this class.
<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy" /> enumeration value that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy" /> valor de enumeração que especifica a diretiva de referência para o resolvedor peer criado com esse elemento de associação.
